ygData.subject: Cleric Only Weapon- why?
ygData.msgSnippet: Even if I was given the opportunity to loot that weapon, I probably wouldn t. The only reason I might loot it is for the novelty or for trade- isn t it no
ygData.messageBody:
Even if I was given the opportunity to loot that weapon, I probably wouldn't.
The only reason I might loot it is for the novelty or for trade- isn't it no
drop? If so, there goes that thought. I'll take my Charred Guardian Shield and
soon completed Paw anyday over that weapon. Wow, a whole what- maybe 60 pts of
damage to something that has 2K-5K hitpoints? If it had some +wis like the
shaman or druid only weapons (those in the game and being implemented), then
maybe.

Oh well, I don't really need a weapon anyway, but thanks for thinking of us
Verant. Oh, wait a minute..... you think clerics are so balanced that you don't
want to give us weapon that may help us do our job? You're right on class
balance, but never mind the thanks :)

Ailamil
